TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed VisualBrush extends System.Windows.Media.TileBrush
Public NotInheritable Class VisualBrush Inherits TileBrush
public ref class VisualBrush sealed : System::Windows::Media::TileBrush

span.span: Paints an area with a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有兩種方式來指定內容的。There are two ways to specify the content of a . - 建立新並用它來設定屬性。Create a new and use it to set the property of the . - 使用現有，它會建立重複的映像的目標。Use an existing , which creates a duplicate image of the target . 然後您可以使用以建立交錯效果，例如反映和縮放比例。You can then use the to create interesting effects, such as reflection and magnification. 當您定義新如而且是上執行 （例如面板或控制項），這個版面配置系統及其子項目時屬性設定為`true`。When you define a new for a and that is a (such as a panel or control), the layout system runs on the and its child elements when the property is set to `true`. 不過，根基本上與; 系統的其餘部分隔離樣式、 腳本和外部配置無法普及到此界限。However, the root is essentially isolated from the rest of the system; styles, storyboards, and external layout can't permeate this boundary. 因此，您應該明確指定根大小，因為其唯一的父代是，因此它無法自動調整本身所繪製的區域。Therefore, you should explicitly specify the size of the root , because its only parent is the and therefore it cannot automatically size itself to the area being painted. 如需 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 中配置的詳細資訊，請參閱[配置](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md)。For more information about layout in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], see the [Layout](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md). 視覺化樹狀結構的更新如果將不會傳播筆刷的父鏈結。Updates to the visual tree of a will not propagate if a is in the brush's parent chain. 您可以解決這項限制效果的上方物件上強制執行場景的更新。You can workaround this limitation by forcing an update of the scene on the object above the effect. 您可以呼叫或包含強制執行場景更新動畫。You can call or include an animation to force a scene update. **可凍結的功能：** 因為它繼承自類別類別提供數個特殊功能：可以宣告為物件，因此在多個物件之間共用。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as and shared among multiple objects. 如需有關所提供的不同功能物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). > [!NOTE] > A無法成為唯讀 （凍結） 當其以外屬性設定為任何值 `null.`A cannot be made read-only (frozen) when its property is set to any value other than `null.`

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性設定為`true`影響時，才這個筆刷是包含非父代。Setting this property to `true` has an effect only when this brush's is a non-parented . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例顯示的效果屬性上包含非父代。The following example shows the effects of the property on a non-parented . [!code-csharp[visualbrush_markup_snip#AutoLayoutContentNonParentedUIElementExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/visualbrush_markup_snip/CSharp/AutoLayoutContentExample.cs#autolayoutcontentnonparenteduielementexample)] [!code-vb[visualbrush_markup_snip#AutoLayoutContentNonParentedUIElementExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/visualbrush_markup_snip/visualbasic/autolayoutcontentexample.vb#autolayoutcontentnonparenteduielementexample)] [!code-xaml[visualbrush_markup_snip#AutoLayoutContentNonParentedUIElementExample](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/visualbrush_markup_snip/XAML/AutoLayoutContentExample.xaml#autolayoutcontentnonparenteduielementexample)] 下圖顯示範例的輸出：The following illustration shows the example's output: ![非 AutoLayoutContent-成為父代 UIElement](~/add/media/graphicsmm-visualbrush-autolayoutcontentproperty-nonparented.png "非父代之 UIElement 的 AutoLayoutContent")![AutoLayoutContent with a non-parented UIElement](~/add/media/graphicsmm-visualbrush-autolayoutcontentproperty-nonparented.png "AutoLayoutContent with a non-parented UIElement") 下一個範例顯示的效果屬性成為的。The next example shows the effects of the property on a parented . [!code-csharp[visualbrush_markup_snip#AutoLayoutContentParentedUIElementExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/visualbrush_markup_snip/CSharp/AutoLayoutContentExample.cs#autolayoutcontentparenteduielementexample)] [!code-vb[visualbrush_markup_snip#AutoLayoutContentParentedUIElementExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/visualbrush_markup_snip/visualbasic/autolayoutcontentexample.vb#autolayoutcontentparenteduielementexample)] [!code-xaml[visualbrush_markup_snip#AutoLayoutContentParentedUIElementExample](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/visualbrush_markup_snip/XAML/AutoLayoutContentExample.xaml#autolayoutcontentparenteduielementexample)] 下圖顯示範例的輸出：The following illustration shows the example's output: ![父代之 UIElement 的 AutoLayoutContent](~/add/media/graphicsmm-visualbrush-autolayoutcontentproperty-parented.png "父代之 UIElement 的 AutoLayoutContent")![AutoLayoutContent with a parented UIElement](~/add/media/graphicsmm-visualbrush-autolayoutcontentproperty-parented.png "AutoLayoutContent with a parented UIElement")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this object, making deep copies of this object's current values.

summary.span: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

span.span: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.

returns.span: 目前物件的可修改複本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

summary.span: 取得或設定筆刷的內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the brush's content.
The brush's content.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有兩種方式來指定內容的。There are two ways to specify the content of a . - 建立新並用它來設定屬性。Create a new and use it to set the property of the . - 使用現有，它會建立重複的映像的目標。Use an existing , which creates a duplicate image of the target . 然後您可以使用以建立交錯效果，例如反映和縮放比例。You can then use the to create interesting effects, such as reflection and magnification. 是在整體 WPF 類別階層相當高，因此非常大量的物件可能無法做為您用於視覺效果; 整個清單無法顯示於此處。 is quite high in the overall WPF class hierarchy, so a very large number of objects could possibly serve as the visual that you use for a ; the entire list cannot be shown here. 請參閱; 請參閱 「 繼承階層架構 」 區段中，將會顯示立即衍生的類別。See ; refer to the "Inheritance Hierarchy" section, which will show the immediately derived classes. 您可以按一下 立即衍生的類別，並周遊具體的可能值的完整範圍的階層。You can then click on the immediately derived classes and traverse the hierarchies to get a sense of the full range of possibilities. 在最上層的兩個最常見的類別目錄的物件中可以使用是或。At a top level, the two most common categories of objects you might use for a are or . 包含基本上任何 UI 項目，否則可以參與 WPF 應用程式的 UI。 encompasses basically any UI element that can otherwise participate in the UI for a WPF application. 包含，其中包含一或多個-衍生物件。 contains a that includes one or more -derived objects. 當您定義新如而且是上執行 （例如面板或控制項），這個版面配置系統及其子項目時屬性設定為`true`。When you define a new for a and that is a (such as a panel or control), the layout system runs on the and its child elements when the property is set to `true`. 不過，根基本上與; 系統的其餘部分隔離樣式、 腳本和外部聽寫筆刷套用的之父代的配置無法普及到此界限。However, the root is essentially isolated from the rest of the system; styles, storyboards, and external layout dictated by the parent where the brush is applied cannot permeate this boundary. 因此，您應該明確指定根大小，因為其唯一的父代是，因此它無法自動調整本身所繪製的區域。Therefore, you should explicitly specify the size of the root , because its only parent is the and therefore it cannot automatically size itself to the area being painted. 如需 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 中配置的詳細資訊，請參閱[配置](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md)。For more information about layout in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)], see the [Layout](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md). 視覺化樹狀結構的更新如果將不會傳播筆刷的父鏈結。Updates to the visual tree of a will not propagate if a is in the brush's parent chain. 您可以解決這項限制效果的上方物件上強制執行場景的更新。You can workaround this limitation by forcing an update of the scene on the object above the effect. 您可以呼叫或包含強制執行場景更新動畫。You can call or include an animation to force a scene update. > [!NOTE] > A無法成為唯讀 （凍結） 當其以外屬性設定為任何值 `null.`A cannot be made read-only (frozen) when its property is set to any value other than `null.` ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage <*object* `Visual`="{*bindingExpression*}"/><*object* `Visual`="{*bindingExpression*}"/> \-或-\- or - <*object* `Visual`="{*resourceExpression*}"/><*object* `Visual`="{*resourceExpression*}"/> ## XAML 值XAML Values `singleVisualRoot` 定義新的視覺項目之筆刷的單一物件項目。A single object element that defines a new visual element for the brush. 這必須是衍生自物件。This must be an object that derives from . 請參閱＜備註＞。See Remarks. `bindingExpression` 評估為現有的 A執行個體。A that evaluates to an existing instance. `resourceExpression` A`StaticResource`或`DynamicResource`會評估為現有執行個體。A `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource` that evaluates to an existing instance. 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md) ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
